metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40648 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In man2html 1.6g, a filename can be created to overwrite the previous size parameter of the next chunk and the fd, bk, fd_nextsize, bk_nextsize of the current chunk. The next chunk is then freed later on, causing a freeing of an arbitrary amount of memory.

criterions.comment: man2html package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
